评论详情: I bought this for my granddaughter as part of her Christmas gift.  I know that she loves skeletons and thought this would fit the bill.  Well, on Christmas afternoon, when she opened her gift, she was really pleased with it.  The material was silky, the print was true and clear, and the shirt ran true to size.  I'm glad I got it for her, and would recommend it.

I normally wear a medium in shirts so I got this in an XL thinking it would be oversized on me. Nope. It fits like a regular medium shirt would. I'd need this in a 3x to look like the model in the photo.
Great quality just runs short. Not like the picture. Was buying for the baggy look and did not get that. Soft and comfortable just fits super short.

Again about it for the same friend and was not his color plus it said women’s and men’s shirt and just because it said women’s, he didn’t want it so nothing wrong with the shirt the material or anything about it. It was just what it said in the color.
Shirt way too small ordered xl. Couldn't fit my 10yr old

I purchased this shirt because it has the Grateful Dead "Skull and Roses" artwork on it and I thought, for the price, it looks like a great deal. I learned the hard lesson of you get what you pay for. The sizing is TERRIBLE. I ordered a 3x knowing that these things run small. I'd be SHOCKED if I learned it was a large. I don't know because the sizing isn't listed on the label. The fabric is super cheap and so thin you can literally see thru it. See thru it so good I can read this review on my phone! Not happy AT ALL. The hassle I'm going to have to go thru in order to get my money back isn't going to be worth what I spent on it. My suggestion? DO NOT BUY!
Buen material y calidad de producto, pero la talla enviada no era la correcta...llego pequeña y al ser enviada a otro pais resulta mas cosotoso en dinero y tiempo intentar un cambio.
I thought the shirt was going to be oversize but it’s not and the Quality of the shirt is bad too 🤦🏻‍♀️
